author: Darlene Hull
comment: Great,  creative watch faces but won't sync anymore with my moto 360. None of them will work. Some (though not all) worked before,  but suddenly,  nothing.  I think the app got an update,  and that's why it's not working...

author: Sherry Corbett
comment: Really like all the watch faces so far. Great job dev. Color changing goat....yes please
title: Love the faces

author: Simon Czarnota
comment: It's great but very limited selection of free watchfaces, I would prefer more themed digital faces like the current winter ones.

author: jonathan moss
comment: Need more faces thou
title: Love it

author: Ryan Agustin
comment: Not working
title: Useless

author: Ramon Cofi
comment: Excellent I like simple and original

author: Moko Chang
comment: Keeps crashing

author: Goddard A-M
comment: As soon as I tap the icon it force closes.
title: Crashes on Note 2

comment: Great update.  Beautiful work.

reply.author: SUNCOD
reply.content: Hey Jesse, we fixed that issue, the app is stable now.

title: Sweet faces

author: Dennis Noe
comment: This watch face is making my Motorola 360 super laggy and unresponsive

reply.author: SUNCOD
reply.content: Hi Dennis, does this happen to all 4 watch faces or just one of them, please help us by giving some more details to this email support@suncod.com, so we can provide appropriate fixes in the next versions. Thank you.

title: super laggy

author: Anh Tuan
comment: Thank you for the fix, my battery loves it now.
title: Love it!!!

author: Martin Reinders
comment: Please a 24h option for the existing faces aswell...

reply.author: SUNCOD
reply.content: Hey Martin, thank you for your feedback, could you please send an email to support@suncod.com and let us know: which device you are using? how often does it happen or basically anything useful informations that help us to address the bug faster. Thank you.

title: 24h option

author: Mitchell O'Briant
comment: It looks great but it drained my battery like crazy. I'm uninstalling until it gets fixed.

reply.author: SUNCOD
reply.content: Hi Mitchell, you can now reinstall the app, Slick watchface will no longer drain your battery, we also updated a new free theme as an apology to our beloved users. Let us know if you have any problems using the app, thank you.

author: Mike Cormier
comment: Little different than the others,but I like it.

author: Armann Singh
comment: It has nice, clean , and simple yet elegant watchfaces
title: very nice

author: Chan Le
comment: The best on the market. The team did a superb job for this new release

reply.author: SUNCOD
reply.content: Thanks for supporting Slick Watchface app. Cheers!

title: Super awesome app!!!

author: Barry John Williams
comment: Could be improved by supporting 24 hour clock.

reply.author: SUNCOD
reply.content: Hi Barry, thanks so much for your feedback. We will definitely add 24-hour clock in the upcoming versions. Stay tune!

title: Clean and well designed watch face

author: William Bielinski
comment: Faces look really nice.  Drained my battery to %18 in less than 2 hours.

reply.author: SUNCOD
reply.content: Hi William, thank you so much for your feedback, the new update fixes the battery drain issue, please update/reinstall the app, thank you.

title: Destroyed my 360 battery

author: Simon May
comment: I really like the watch face, would look great on a Moto 360, but its destroying my battery.

reply.author: SUNCOD
reply.content: Hi Simon, we have just uploaded an update that fixes that battery drain issue, please update/reinstall the app and let us know if the issue is still there. Thank you.

author: Kelly Huffman
comment: But doesn't work
title: Looks cool...

comment: Wonderful!!
